Label: Purpose
Suppressed: To hide items from users in the search results. If set to "true", the record will not appear in search results. It is still accessible from the data relations widgets and via direct URL.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Suppressed: Only one of two values are allowed: true or false.

Label: Commentary
Suppressed: This field is useful for multipart items with identical metadata, such as pages in an atlas or series.
